name: Prepare for the adventure of your life
name_original: Prepare for the adventure of your life
description:
A one-button game made for #TOJam12 -What Twelves Below and adapted for the Hand Eye Society's One-Button Torontron arcade cabinet.

Controls:
- Left Mouse Button to interact
- Escape to quit
- R to restart

Instructions:
- Press the button to interact with the story.

Programming - Eleanor Chan

Programming & Design - Jesse Sponder

Art - Daylan Rogan

Narrative Design & Project Management - Devon Wiersma
